name: Some of them have bombs in
name_original: Some of them have bombs in
description:
There are packages going to the top.

Some of them have bombs in.

The bomb-detecting machines will show you if a package has a bomb.

If it does then click and drag it to the Controlled Explosion area.

Dragging a non-bomb-package to the Controlled Explosion area will cause you to lose points.

If a bomb reaches the top then it's game over. 

Press M to turn off the music.

I over-scoped so went well over the 3 hours to around 6.

Sounds from freesound.org under creative commons license:

https://freesound.org/people/zagi2/sounds/268014/
